name: pinny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK informal a piece of clothing worn over the front of other clothes to keep them clean while cooking or doing other work in the house: It's time to put your pinny on and get baking. Waitresses in pinnies scurried about. Synonyms
apron
pinafore
US a piece of clothing like a light shirt with no sleeves that is worn over other clothing, for example in team games to show which team a person is playing for: You will need pinnies of two different colors so that you can split your squad in half. Each kid takes a soccer ball and a pinny at the beginning of the session. Synonyms
bib
scrimmage vest
Alistair Berg/DigitalVision/GettyImages
